text: The 2019–20 Parma Calcio 1913 season was the club's second consecutive season back in Serie A, following their promotion from Serie B at the end of the 2017–18 season. The club competed in Serie A and the Coppa Italia. ==Players== ===Squad information=== :Appearances include league matches only {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:left; font-size:90%; width:100%;"
